sk88witch:

HEY friendies. as u may or may not have sussed out from my post about the birds and then my subsequent getting very drunk, we have bird mites! this is a very sad and terrible thing and the more sad and terrible thing is that i canât go to work. like iâm not allowed to go to work! because museums! and even though the bugs arenât dangerous, like, they canât treat the space if it gets bugs in it because museums! itâs a huge expense! and the guy came today and he sprayed, but he canât move the nest until the birds fly away. and theyâre so close to being flown away but theyâre not, yet, and the problem therefore is this: the source of the mites still exists, and theoretically they canât get in, but i canât ten thousand percent guarantee that to my bosses, which means i canât go to work. and iâve already missed a week for the funeral, etc., so iâm looking at two solid weeks of no money coming in at all and all of my bills are due the first week of august. of course!

Â this is where you come in!

tldr: I HAVE TONS OF FREE TIME BECAUSE IâM NOT ALLOWED TO WORK.

I WILL READ YOUR TAROT! I WILL DO YOUR BIRTH CHART! I WILL PERFORM SPELLS FOR U IF YOUR HEART DESIRES! ALL OF THESE THINGS CAN BE YOURS FOR A MINIMAL DONATION SO THAT I DONâT GO TOTALLY BROKE. FLINGS GLITTER AND VANISHES.
